thread.section_title: KILL CLIFF Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KILL CLIFF | killcliff.com
thread.title: Mary

author: Mary
title: Mary
text: Love this company and their values. They deliver a great product and use those profits for an even greater cause. My only suggestion is to update customers on their shipment status if there are any major changes. Due to circumstances no one could control my shipment was 2 days late. Not a huge deal but it would be great to know about when it happens. Thanks for all the hard work you put in and keep making this superior product!
